titles.title: SF85 Praise the Lord who reigns above

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
1 Praise the Lord who reigns above
and keeps his court below;
praise the holy God of love,
and all his greatness show;praise him for his noble deeds,
praise him for his matchless power:
him from whom all good proceeds
let earth and heaven adore.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
2 Celebrate the eternal God
with harp and psaltery,
timbrels soft and cymbals loud
in his high praise agree:
praise him every tuneful string;
all the reach of heavenly art,
all the powers of music bring,
the music of the heart.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
3 Him, in whom they move and live,
let every creature sing,
glory to their Maker give,
and homage to their King:
hallowed be his name beneath,
as in heaven on earth adored;
praise the Lord in every breath,
let all things praise the Lord.
Charles Wesley (1707-1788)
